item.title: 2019 College Student Innovation and Entrepreneurship Training Program Project
item.description: Introduction Since the middle of the last century, with the continuous innovation of technology, biological research methods have continued to make progress, such as fluorescence imaging, luminescence imaging, photoacoustic imaging, optical tomography, and a series of blot hybridization methods. A series of advanced technologies combined with computers provide great convenience for modern scientists' data analysis. Due to the continuous improvement of experimental conditions, in order to provide more accurate experimental results, the experimenters have increased the number of samples in the experiment.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
